summary: This document is a declaration by Gregory S. Luster, who serves as the CFO and General Counsel of a business involved in the Epstein case. It certifies the authenticity of records provided to law enforcement in connection with an investigation by the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Gregory S. Luster
persons.context: Gregory S. Luster declares the authenticity of business records related to the Epstein investigation.

locations: 21 E. Main Street, Suite 100, Oklahoma City, OK 73104
keyFacts: Gregory S. Luster is the CFO and General Counsel of the business involved.
The declaration certifies that the records were made at or near the time of the events they describe.
The records were kept in the course of regularly conducted business activity.
The declaration was executed on November 15, 2021.
The records are subject to a protective order.
